verses.verse: חַטַּ֣את <S%H2403><s%> The sin יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah כְּתוּבָ֛ה <S%H3789><s%> [is] written בְּעֵ֥ט <S%H5842><s%> with a pen בַּרְזֶ֖ל <S%H1270><s%> of iron בְּצִפֹּ֣רֶן <S%H6856><s%> [and] with the point שָׁמִ֑יר <S%H8068><s%> of a diamond חֲרוּשָׁה֙ <S%H2790><s%> [it is] graven עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon ל֣וּחַ <S%H3871><s%> upon the table לִבָּ֔ם <S%H3820><s%> of their heart וּלְקַרְנ֖וֹת <S%H7161><s%> and upon the horns מִזְבְּחוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H4196><s%> of your altars

כִּזְכֹּ֤ר <S%H2142><s%> remember בְּנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> Whilst their children מִזְבְּחוֹתָ֔ם <S%H4196><s%> their altars וַאֲשֵׁרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H842><s%> and their groves עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> trees רַֽעֲנָ֑ן <S%H7488><s%> by the green עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and גְּבָע֥וֹת <S%H1389><s%> hills הַגְּבֹהֽוֹת׃ <S%H1364><s%> upon the high

הֲרָרִי֙ <S%H2042><s%> O my mountain בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field חֵילְךָ֥ <S%H2428><s%> thy substance כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אוֹצְרוֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H214><s%> [and] all thy treasures לָבַ֣ז <S%H957><s%> to the spoil אֶתֵּ֑ן <S%H5414><s%> I will give בָּמֹתֶ֕יךָ <S%H1116><s%> [and] thy high places בְּחַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> for sin בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> throughout גְּבוּלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1366><s%> throughout all thy borders

וְשָׁמַטְתָּ֗ה <S%H8058><s%> And thou even thyself shalt discontinue וּבְךָ֙ מִנַּחֲלָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H5159><s%> from thine heritage אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> that I gave לָ֔ךְ וְהַעֲבַדְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5647><s%> thee and I will cause thee to serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹ֣יְבֶ֔יךָ <S%H341><s%> thine enemies בָּאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָדָ֑עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> which thou knowest כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֛שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire קְדַחְתֶּ֥ם <S%H6919><s%> not for ye have kindled בְּאַפִּ֖י <S%H639><s%> in mine anger עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> ever תּוּקָֽד׃ <S%H3344><s%> [which] shall burn ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אָר֤וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed הַגֶּ֙בֶר֙ <S%H1397><s%> [be] the man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who יִבְטַ֣ח <S%H982><s%> that trusteth בָּֽאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> in man וְשָׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> and maketh בָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh זְרֹע֑וֹ <S%H2220><s%> his arm וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD יָס֥וּר <S%H5493><s%> departeth לִבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3820><s%> and whose heart

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> will be like כְּעַרְעָ֣ר <S%H6176><s%> A bush בָּֽעֲרָבָ֔ה <S%H6160><s%> in the desert וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without יִרְאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> and shall not see כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> when יָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> cometh ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> when good וְשָׁכַ֤ן <S%H7931><s%> but shall inhabit חֲרֵרִים֙ <S%H2788><s%> the parched places בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land מְלֵחָ֖ה <S%H4420><s%> [in] a salt וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without תֵשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> and not inhabited ס

בָּר֣וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed הַגֶּ֔בֶר <S%H1397><s%> [is] the man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יִבְטַ֖ח <S%H982><s%> that trusteth בַּֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מִבְטַחֽוֹ׃ <S%H4009><s%> and whose hope

וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> will be like כְּעֵ֣ץ ׀ <S%H6086><s%> For he shall be as a tree שָׁת֣וּל <S%H8362><s%> planted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by מַ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> by the waters וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by יוּבַל֙ <S%H3105><s%> by the river יְשַׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> and [that] spreadeth out שָֽׁרָשָׁ֔יו <S%H8328><s%> her roots וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Nor [יִרָא כ] (יִרְאֶה֙ <S%H3372><s%> affright ק) כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when יָבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> cometh חֹ֔ם <S%H2527><s%> when heat וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become עָלֵ֖הוּ <S%H5929><s%> but her leaf רַֽעֲנָ֑ן <S%H7488><s%> shall be green וּבִשְׁנַ֤ת <S%H8141><s%> in the year בַּצֹּ֙רֶת֙ <S%H1226><s%> of drought לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִדְאָ֔ג <S%H1672><s%> and shall not be careful וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יָמִ֖ישׁ <S%H4185><s%> neither shall cease מֵעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> from yielding פֶּֽרִי׃ <S%H6529><s%> fruit

עָקֹ֥ב <S%H6121><s%> [is] deceitful הַלֵּ֛ב <S%H3820><s%> The heart מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all וְאָנֻ֣שׁ <S%H605><s%> above all [things] and desperately wicked ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> Who יֵדָעֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> who can know

אֲנִ֧י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> I the LORD חֹקֵ֥ר <S%H2713><s%> search לֵ֖ב <S%H3820><s%> the heart בֹּחֵ֣ן <S%H974><s%> [I] try כְּלָי֑וֹת <S%H3629><s%> the reins וְלָתֵ֤ת <S%H5414><s%> even to give לְאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> every man [כְּדַרְכֹּו כ] (כִּדְרָכָ֔יו <S%H1870><s%> along ק) כִּפְרִ֖י <S%H6529><s%> [and] according to the fruit מַעֲלָלָֽיו׃ <S%H4611><s%> of his doings ס

קֹרֵ֤א <S%H7124><s%> [As] the partridge דָגַר֙ <S%H1716><s%> sitteth וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> has not יָלָ֔ד <S%H3205><s%> [on eggs] and hatcheth עֹ֥שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> [them] not [so] he that getteth עֹ֖שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> riches וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> by בְמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> and not by right בַּחֲצִ֤י <S%H2677><s%> them in the midst [יֹמֹו כ] (יָמָיו֙ <S%H3117><s%> age ק) יַעַזְבֶ֔נּוּ <S%H5800><s%> shall leave וּבְאַחֲרִית֖וֹ <S%H319><s%> and at his end יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will be a נָבָֽל׃ <S%H5036><s%> shall be a fool

כִּסֵּ֣א <S%H3678><s%> throne כָב֔וֹד <S%H3519><s%> A glorious מָר֖וֹם <S%H4791><s%> high מֵֽרִאשׁ֑וֹן <S%H7223><s%> from the beginning מְק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> [is] the place מִקְדָּשֵֽׁנוּ׃ <S%H4720><s%> of our sanctuary

מִקְוֵ֤ה <S%H4723><s%> the hope יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All עֹזְבֶ֖יךָ <S%H5800><s%> all that forsake יֵבֹ֑שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> thee shall be ashamed [יִסֹורַי כ] (וְסוּרַי֙ <S%H3249><s%> they that depart ק) בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth יִכָּתֵ֔בוּ <S%H3789><s%> shall be written כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because עָזְב֛וּ <S%H5800><s%> because they have forsaken מְק֥וֹר <S%H4726><s%> the fountain מַֽיִם־ <S%H4325><s%> waters חַיִּ֖ים <S%H2416><s%> of living אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

רְפָאֵ֤נִי <S%H7495><s%> Heal יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD וְאֵ֣רָפֵ֔א <S%H7495><s%> and I shall be healed הוֹשִׁיעֵ֖נִי <S%H3467><s%> save וְאִוָּשֵׁ֑עָה <S%H3467><s%> me and I shall be saved כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for תְהִלָּתִ֖י <S%H8416><s%> for thou [art] my praise אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> you

הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Look הֵ֕מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like אֹמְרִ֖ים <S%H559><s%> Behold they say אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me אַיֵּ֥ה <S%H346><s%> Where דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> unto me Where [is] the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah יָ֥בוֹא <S%H935><s%> abide נָֽא׃ <S%H4994><s%> now

וַאֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> You לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor אַ֣צְתִּי ׀ <S%H213><s%> As for me I have not hastened מֵרֹעֶ֣ה <S%H7462><s%> from [being] a pastor אַחֲרֶ֗יךָ <S%H310><s%> to follow וְי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אָנ֛וּשׁ <S%H605><s%> the woeful לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor הִתְאַוֵּ֖יתִי <S%H183><s%> thee neither have I desired אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> Yourself יָדָ֑עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> thou knowest מוֹצָ֣א <S%H4161><s%> that which came out שְׂפָתַ֔י <S%H8193><s%> of my lips נֹ֥כַח <S%H5227><s%> was [right] before פָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thee הָיָֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּֽהְיֵה־ <S%H1961><s%> become
לִ֖י לִמְחִתָּ֑ה <S%H4288><s%> Be not a terror מַֽחֲסִי־ <S%H4268><s%> unto me thou [art] my hope אַ֖תָּה <S%H859><s%> in בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> of evil

יֵבֹ֤שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> Let them be confounded רֹדְפַי֙ <S%H7291><s%> that persecute וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not אֵבֹ֣שָׁה <S%H954><s%> me but let not me be confounded אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> I יֵחַ֣תּוּ <S%H2865><s%> let them be dismayed הֵ֔מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay אֵחַ֖תָּה <S%H2865><s%> but let not me be dismayed אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> I הָבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> bring עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> on י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> upon them the day רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> of evil וּמִשְׁנֶ֥ה <S%H4932><s%> them with double שִׁבָּר֖וֹן <S%H7670><s%> destruction שָׁבְרֵֽם׃ <S%H7665><s%> and destroy ס

כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> Thus said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me הָלֹ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> unto me Go וְעָֽמַדְתָּ֙ <S%H5975><s%> and stand בְּשַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> in the gate בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children [עָם כ] (הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> folk ק) אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יָבֹ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> come in בוֹ֙ מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> whereby the kings יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which יֵ֣צְאוּ <S%H3318><s%> and by the which they go out ב֑וֹ וּבְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all שַׁעֲרֵ֥י <S%H8179><s%> and in all the gates יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> And say אֲ֠לֵיהֶם <S%H413><s%> to שִׁמְע֨וּ <S%H8085><s%> unto them Hear דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> ye the word יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מַלְכֵ֤י <S%H4428><s%> ye kings יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> and all Judah וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> and all the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem הַבָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> that enter in בַּשְּׁעָרִ֥ים <S%H8179><s%> by these gates הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these ס

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִשָּׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> Take heed בְּנַפְשֽׁוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> to yourselves וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> and bear מַשָּׂא֙ <S%H4853><s%> no burden בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbath וַהֲבֵאתֶ֖ם <S%H935><s%> nor bring בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֥י <S%H8179><s%> [it] in by the gates יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תוֹצִ֨יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> Neither carry forth מַשָּׂ֤א <S%H4853><s%> a burden מִבָּֽתֵּיכֶם֙ <S%H1004><s%> out of your houses בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbath וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> ye any work לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תַֽעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> neither do וְקִדַּשְׁתֶּם֙ <S%H6942><s%> but hallow אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <S%H7676><s%> ye the sabbath כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> I צִוִּ֖יתִי <S%H6680><s%> as I commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> your fathers

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָֽׁמְע֔וּ <S%H8085><s%> But they obeyed וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or הִטּ֖וּ <S%H5186><s%> not neither inclined אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָזְנָ֑ם <S%H241><s%> their ear וַיַּקְשׁוּ֙ <S%H7185><s%> stiff אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָרְפָּ֔ם <S%H6203><s%> but made their neck לְבִלְתִּ֣י <S%H1115><s%> because [שֹׁומֵעַ כ] (שְׁמֹ֔ועַ <S%H8085><s%> listen ק) וּלְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> or קַ֥חַת <S%H3947><s%> nor receive מוּסָֽר׃ <S%H4148><s%> instruction

וְ֠הָיָה <S%H1961><s%> will come אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if שָׁמֹ֨עַ <S%H8085><s%> And it shall come to pass if ye diligently תִּשְׁמְע֤וּן <S%H8085><s%> hearken אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> to me נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> unto me saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְבִלְתִּ֣י ׀ <S%H1115><s%> no הָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> to bring מַשָּׂ֗א <S%H4853><s%> in no burden בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֛י <S%H8179><s%> through the gates הָעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> of this city הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbath וּלְקַדֵּשׁ֙ <S%H6942><s%> but hallow אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <S%H7676><s%> the sabbath לְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> no עֲשֽׂוֹת־ <S%H6213><s%> to do [בֹּה כ] (בֹּ֖ו ק) כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner מְלָאכָֽה׃ <S%H4399><s%> work

וּבָ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> Then shall there enter בְשַׁעֲרֵ֣י <S%H8179><s%> into the gates הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> of this city הַזֹּ֡את <S%H2063><s%> likewise מְלָכִ֣ים ׀ <S%H4428><s%> kings וְשָׂרִ֡ים <S%H8269><s%> and princes יֹשְׁבִים֩ <S%H3427><s%> sitting עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסֵּ֨א <S%H3678><s%> upon the throne דָוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> of David רֹכְבִ֣ים ׀ <S%H7392><s%> riding בָּרֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> in chariots וּבַסּוּסִ֗ים <S%H5483><s%> and on horses הֵ֚מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they וְשָׂ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H8269><s%> they and their princes אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> the men יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> and the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וְיָשְׁבָ֥ה <S%H3427><s%> shall remain הָֽעִיר־ <S%H5892><s%> and this city הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

וּבָ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they shall come מֵעָרֵֽי־ <S%H5892><s%> from the cities יְ֠הוּדָה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּמִסְּבִיב֨וֹת <S%H5439><s%> and from the places about יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem וּמֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and from the land בִּנְיָמִ֗ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשְּׁפֵלָ֤ה <S%H8219><s%> and from the plain וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָהָר֙ <S%H2022><s%> and from the mountains וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and from הַנֶּ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> and from the south מְבִאִ֛ים <S%H935><s%> bringing עוֹלָ֥ה <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings וְזֶ֖בַח <S%H2077><s%> and sacrifices וּמִנְחָ֣ה <S%H4503><s%> and meat offerings וּלְבוֹנָ֑ה <S%H3828><s%> and incense וּמְבִאֵ֥י <S%H935><s%> and bringing תוֹדָ֖ה <S%H8426><s%> sacrifices of praise בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשְׁמְע֜וּ <S%H8085><s%> But if ye will not hearken אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me לְקַדֵּשׁ֙ <S%H6942><s%> unto me to hallow אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <S%H7676><s%> the sabbath וּלְבִלְתִּ֣י ׀ <S%H1115><s%> not שְׂאֵ֣ת <S%H5375><s%> and not to bear מַשָּׂ֗א <S%H4853><s%> a burden וּבֹ֛א <S%H935><s%> even entering in בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֥י <S%H8179><s%> at the gates יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbath וְהִצַּ֧תִּי <S%H3341><s%> then will I kindle אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire בִּשְׁעָרֶ֗יהָ <S%H8179><s%> in the gates וְאָֽכְלָ֛ה <S%H398><s%> thereof and it shall devour אַרְמְנ֥וֹת <S%H759><s%> the palaces יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and it תִכְבֶּֽה׃ <S%H3518><s%> and it shall not be quenched פ
